Text: How come it's only 700 MB? Always used to be 1.09 GB for the HDTV 40-minute episodes.

Overall, I would expect this one to be more jumpy or have more motion issues in fast scenes.

Here's the difference between this one and a previous season that is ~1GB:

Season 3:
File size : 1.09 GiB
Duration : 42mn 28s
Overall bit rate : 3683 Kbps
Bit rate   : 3297 Kbps
Bits/(Pixel*Frame) : 0.149
Stream size : 980 MiB (88%)

This one:

Can someone please upload a proper 1GB version?
This rip is pretty poor - active sound normalization has been used, so the sound level is all over the place. Picture is also pretty choppy. I'm missing the 1 gb rips of the previous seasons...
agreed noticable loss in picture quality over previous seasons, anyone know if they are all gonna be like this from now on?
